SELECT hydat.`value`, CASE WHEN hydat.`value` = 'tender_recover_yes' THEN '收到还款' WHEN hydat.`value` ='increase_interest_repay_yes' THEN '加息收益' ELSE
hydat.`name` END AS `name` FROM ht_account_trade hydat WHERE hydat.`status` = 1 AND hydat.`value` IN ( 'recharge', 'borrow_success', 'tender_recover_yes', 'credit_tender_recover_yes', 'plan_repay', 'increase_interest_repay_yes', 'recharge_offline', 'tender_success', 'cash_success', 'creditassign', 'hjh_invest', 'hjh_quit' ) ORDER BY hydat.id
